scripts.asbuild:web: asc src/main.ts -o ./dist/imu6886.wasm -t build/imu6886.wat -b build/imu6886.d.ts --runtime minimal --exportRuntime --lowMemoryLimit 32767 --use Math=NativeMathf -O3 --optimize
scripts.asbuild: asc src/main.ts -o ../../resources/wasm/imu6886.wasm -t build/imu6886.wat -b build/imu6886.d.ts --runtime minimal --exportRuntime --lowMemoryLimit 32767 --use Math=NativeMathf -O3 --optimize
scripts.deploy: npm run asbuild:web && parcel build --public-url '.' web/index.html
